title: #45: The Depopulation Agenda
description:
Do you ever get the feeling that your government is trying to kill you? They are, and you are not alone in feeling that way.

The more people there are on the planet, the more difficult it is for them to control everyone, so they have made the decision that if they can’t physically control everyone outright, the next best solution is to just get rid of the “useless eaters” and “undesirables” through a stealth program of depopulation through a variety of methods that we explore in this episode.

The signs of their plan are everywhere if you know where to look, and they speak about their plan openly in their books and speeches, through their statues and artwork, and even in their movies and TED Talks. Just because you are paranoid doesn’t mean that you are wrong.
